topic.title: How to Add the Publication Audience to the Custom PDF Metadata

body.p: The audience element indicates the users the publication is addressing. This can be placed inside a topicmeta element in a map as in the following example:<map> ... <topicmeta> ... <audience type="programmer" job="programming" experiencelevel="expert"/>
To collect the type attribute, add the following in your customization css:
body.note: It is best to use the class selector (such as *[class ~= "map/topicmeta"]) instead of topicmeta to cover cases where the elements are specialized (for instance, in a bookmap the bookmeta is a topicmeta, so your selector will also function for bookmaps, not only simple maps.
The selector begins with map > to choose the topicmeta that is a direct child of the map, not other topicmeta elements from other topicref elements.
